resources.string: Answer the questions below and check out your score below. The questions test your Java basic knowledge

What are the two classes that inherit from Throwable?
Will the default constructor be created when you\'ve already declared a constructor with some parameters?
What is a java keyword you would use to tell that a variable, method or a block gets a memory only once, during the creation (at the time of class loading)?
How many objects will be created in the following code?\nString s = new String(\"Welcome\");
